title: keyboard closes when changing inputbox in assigned access mode
body: Up until the latest windows update, the virtual keyboard worked fine, but now (using my app with the most recent nuget packages) in assigned access mode (tablet mode) the keyboard closes when tapping a different inputbox on a xaml form.

comments.body: I was also facing same issue. This issue is fixed now in Version 1803 released on April 30, 2018.
